title: Ingestion
description: Ingestion Config is used to setup a Airflow Ingestion pipeline.

ingestionType.description: Type of Ingestion - Bigquery, Redshift, Snowflake etc...

connectorConfig.description: This defines the configuration for connector.

username.description: username to connect  to the data source.

password.description: password to connect  to the data source.

host.description: Host and port of the data source.

includeViews.description: optional configuration to turn off fetching metadata for views.

enableDataProfiler.description: Run data profiler as part of ingestion to get table profile data.

includeFilterPattern.description: Regex to only fetch tables or databases that matches the pattern.

excludeFilterPattern.description: Regex exclude tables or databases that matches the pattern.

ingestionStatus.description: This defines the runtime status of Ingestion.

state.description: Workflow status denotes if its failed or succeeded.

startDate.description: startDate of the Ingestion Pipeline run for this particular execution.

endDate.description: endDate of the Ingestion pipeline run for this particular execution.

id.description: Unique identifier that identifies this Ingestion.

name.description: Name that identifies this ingestion instance uniquely.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this Ingestion.

fullyQualifiedName.description: Name that uniquely identifies a Ingestion.

forceDeploy.description: Deploy the workflow by overwriting existing workflow with the same name.

pauseWorkflow.description: pause the workflow from running once the deploy is finished successfully.

nextExecutionDate.description: Next execution date from the underlying workflow platform once the ingestion scheduled.

workflowTimezone.description: Timezone in which workflow going to be scheduled.

retries.description: Retry workflow in case of failure.

workflowCatchup.description: Run past executions if the start date is in the past.

scheduleInterval.description: Scheduler Interval for the Workflow in cron format.

workflowTimeout.description: Timeout for the workflow in seconds.

ingestionStatuses.description: List of executions and status for the Ingestion Pipeline.

service.description: Link to the database service where this database is hosted in.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity.

changeDescription.description: Change that led to this version of the entity.
